description: // A deadstock silk/cotton shirting in black. This lightweight fabric has been woven with a silk warp and cotton weft in a yarn-dyed stripe. The stripe is made up of a block of smaller stripes in tones of black creating a shadowy look. The fabric has a subtle bounce and good structure making it ideal for shirts like the Bloom and dresses like the Ivy.

// A deadstock pure silk satin in black. This lightweight fabric has been woven in a classic satin structure with a matt reverse and a lustrous face. Printed in a shadowy check design in tones of dark brown/black.  A beautifully drapey fabric with no stretch. Perfect for an Ivy top, Tide dress or special occasion pieces.

// A pure silk double georgette in black and ivory. This lightweight fabric has been woven in a double georgette structure giving extra weight to this drapey fabric. The screen print design is made up cute stacked & staggered dachshunds in black with the odd one wearing a blue neckerchief.  A semi-transparent fabric with a matt finish, beautiful drape, and no stretch. This versatile fabric has a cool hand feel making it perfect for floaty layering pieces, gathered styles and billowing blouses.

// A deadstock pure silk in dark chocolate. This luxurious fabric has been woven with a georgette base and a thicker silk yarn stripe on both the warp and weft which combine to create a check pattern. The thicker yarn gives this completely sheer fabric a subtle lustre. A beautifully drapey fabric with no stretch. Perfect for an Ivy top, Tide dress or special occasion pieces.

// A luxurious silk jacquard in celery green. This reversible fabric has been woven in a sateen jacquard in green and gold, with one side having gold leaves and a green base, and the other side green leaves and a gold base. The twill structure of this luxurious fabric gives extra stability and lustre. A sparkly fabric ideal for special occasion pieces.

// A luxurious silk jacquard in cherryblossom pink. This lightweight fabric has a completely sheer, pink chiffon base and then woven with a metalic gold paisley motif repeat throughout. Incredible drape makes this luxurious non-stretch silk a great option for gathered styles, layering pieces, scarves, special occasion pieces and billowing blouses.

description: // A Liberty pure silk satin from the Clemments range - Floral Filagree violet. This digital print is made up of layered tiles in royal blue, orange, maroon, teal, yellow and sky magenta on a violet base. Disintegrating florals weave amongst embellished mosaic emblems to create an exquisite overlayed composition in this Floral Filigree Liberty Fabrics print, eluding to hazy memories and sun-induced hallucinations of Arabian travels. A special fabric woven in a satin self-stripe, alternating between a looser and tighter weave creating a very subtle seersucker look on the reverse, and a hammered satin on the face. The design is printed by experts in Italy onto the subtly textured 16 momme silk satin â€“ a fabric prized for its lustrous drape and fluidity, along with its colour luminously. Construct it into special occasion pieces such as gowns, or use it to create opulently wearable daytime designs like wrap dresses and flowing shirting. Add flair to suiting and outerwear and use it as a luxurious statement lining option. Choose this stunning fabric for accessories like scarves, scrunchies and ties for a hint of pattern and colour.
product_name: Liberty Clemments Hammered Satin- Floral Filigree / X

description: // A deadstock silk/ cotton in teal and black. This lightweight fabric has been cleverly woven with sheer black warp striped with a  deep teal stripe, then a sheer black and teal striped weft creating a dimensional check fabric. A sheer fabric with a dry hand feel and no stretch. Ideal for shirts like the Bloom, dresses like the Paint or Ivy.
product_name: Sheer Check Silk / Cotton - Teal / Black

description: // A luxurious shot silk in lapis blue. This lightweight fabric has been woven in a plain weave with a superfine ivory silk warp, and a slubby blue weft creating a shot fabric with a dimensional colour change and a dupion look. The natural variation in the colour and textures of this unique fibre makes for a hazy fabric with variance throughout. A structured, crisp fabric with a dry hand feel and subtle lustre. An opaque fabric with no stretch ideal for shirts and special occasion pieces.

// A deadstock silk/metallic blend jacquard in ivory and gold. This luxe fabric has been woven in a fully reversible jacquard made up of rows of jasmine flower heads equally spaced across the fabric. A striking jacquard with a high shine metallic gold finish, semi-sheer and plenty of bounce. This non-stretch fabric ideal for special occasion pieces.
product_name: Metallic Jasmine Silk Jacquard - Ivory / Gold

description: // A deadstock pure silk crepe de chine in a blue floral print. This lightweight fabric has been tightly woven in a classic crepe de chine structure. A fluid fabric with a subtle lustre and no stretch. The screenprint design is made up of painterly poppies with meandering vine-like foliage in blue tones on an ivory base. This semi-sheer fabric would be ideal for lingerie and as a lining option. Also good for shirts like the Bloom, dresses like the Paint.
material: Poppy Vine Silk Crepe De Chine
product_name: Poppy Vine Silk Crepe De Chine - Blue

description: // A luxurious silk/linen voile in wine red. This lightweight, amazing fabric has great structure and bounce due to the silk warp and linen weft. The sheer fabric has naturally occurring slubs throughout giving a wonderfully crisp and dry feel. This non-stretch fabric would be ideal for layering styles, sculptural pieces and occasion wear.

// A luxurious shot silk in garnet red. This lightweight fabric has been woven in a plain weave with a superfine ivory silk warp, and a slubby red weft creating a shot fabric with a dimensional colour change and a dupion look. The natural variation in the colour and textures of this unique fibre makes for a hazy stripe fabric with variance throughout. A structured, crisp fabric with a dry hand feel and subtle lustre. An opaque fabric with no stretch ideal for shirts and special occasion pieces.

// A deadstock silk chiffon in oxblood red. This lightweight fabric has been woven in a classic chiffon structure, with a smooth hand feel and a matt, sheer finish. The screen print design is made up of bold black hearts on the red base. Incredible drape makes this luxurious width-stretch silk a great option for gathered styles like the Paint, layering pieces, scarves and billowing blouses like the Sequence.

// A deadstock pure silk yoryu in lapis blue. This fabric is a lightweight chiffon with a vertical crinkled texture. The screenprint design is made up of hand-sketched poppy heads in whte with black lines, on a base of lapis blue poppy heads. A sheer fabric with a lot of bounce that looks great gathered or flat in skirts, dresses, tops and scarves.

// A deadstock silk georgette in glaucous blue. This lightweight fabric has been woven in a classic georgette structure, with a subtle texture throughout and a matt, sheer finish. Incredible drape makes this luxurious width-stretch silk a great option for gathered styles like the Paint, layering pieces, scarves and billowing blouses like the Sequence.

// A deadstock silk/viscose in black. This lightweight fabric has been cleverly woven with a horizontal self-stripe in the weft, and then also the warp has very subtle semi-sheer vertical stripes which can only be seen when held up to the light. A bouncy, micro-textured fabric with no stretch and a semi-transparent finish. Ideal for layering pieces and special occasion styles.

description: // A deadstock silk/cotton satin in black. This lightweight fabric has been woven with a superfine, lustrous silk warp and thicker cotton weft creating a luxurious fabric with great bounce and a smooth hand feel. // A deadstock stretch silk/viscose satin in black. This lightweight fabric has been woven with a silk warp and a viscose/elastane weft creating a tightly woven fabric with a lustered face and a matt reverse. This drapey, almost opaque fabric has good width stretch making it ideal for special occasion styles.

// A deadstock pure silk in a deep coral. This lightweight fabric has been woven in a satin weave with a peachy face and matt, flat reverse. Ideal for slips like the Maya, luxe PJ sets like the Sparrow and shirts like the Bloom.
